name: init show
func:
let unit = {
    groups: 
    { 
            hide: 
            [
                "ncd-ultrasound:ultrasound_group1",
                "ncd-ultrasound:ultrasound_group2",
                "ncd-ultrasound:ultrasound_group3",
                "ncd-ultrasound:ultrasound_group4",
                "ncd-ultrasound:ultrasound_group5",
                "ncd-ultrasound:ultrasound_group6",
                "ncd-ultrasound:battCh1",
                "ncd-ultrasound:Inspect1",
                "ncd-ultrasound:Inspect2",
                "ncd-ultrasound:Inspect3"
            ],
            show:
            [
                "ncd-ultrasound:selectmac",
                "ncd-ultrasound:download",
                "ncd-ultrasound:idle1",
                "ncd-ultrasound:idle2",
                "ncd-ultrasound:idle3",
                "ncd-ultrasound:battSingle"
            ]
    } 
}
msg.payload = unit;
return msg;
